name: Together Forever (IcyPigs)
description:
Together Forever is a multiplayer puzzle platformer created for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

You play as two Jigsaw Pieces who are trying to get connected to each other! It contains 10 levels rising in difficulty. 

I made it by myself and I created the entire game. It was made using the free version of construct 3. (Because I don't have the money to spend on the real version)

I hope you enjoy your time with Together Forever!
